item.description:
Join us Monday, Nov 5th, for our usual Geeks Who Drink pub quiz! Hurricane Sandy ruined our fun for last Monday but we're back this coming Monday! YAY!

The usual pub quiz starts at 7:00pm join us and Geeks Who Drink http://geekswhodrink.com/518/ . The quiz consists of 8 rounds of 8 questions and includes a picture round, music round, and chances for FREE BEER! Come early to get a good seat and a good team. ;)Â  Free appetizers while they last.

Battery Park is conveniently located in the Financial District near State Street (Orange and Blue Line), Downtown Crossing (Orange and Red Lines), and a short walk to Park Street (Red and Green Lines). Everyone is responsible for their own food and drink. PLEASE PAY AS YOU GO OR MAINTAIN A SEPARATE TAB. You can view Battery Park's menu here: http://www.batteryparkboston.com/.

Hope to see you there!

P.S. FEEL FREE TO BRING LEFTOVER HALLOWEEN CANDY TO SHARE WITH THE GROUP! :)
item.how_to_find_us: We are usually at the first booth as you walk in. Ask bartender or hostess if you cannot find us.
item.name: Pub Quiz with Geeks Who Drink at Battery Park, Monday November 5th
